name: Mr. Z Toro BP
additionalNotes:
This came from Privada Cigar Club in the November '21 "Brian's Box".  It was un-banded, so I inquired with Brian Desind, owner of PCC, as to what it was.  His reply via email:  "It's Mr. Z from Cordoba Y Morales! The wrapper is from AJâ€™s farm, the binder nicaraguan the filler is ometepe and the forbidden fruit."

My guess is "forbidden fruit" means Cuban tobacco, but I don't know that for sure.
